title: monotime
description: Money is time, a library to figure out what your time costs.

body.value: > [`monotime`](https://github.com/gabrielcsapo/monotime) is an easy way to compute the amount of time a dollar amount will cost based on the normalized wage provided.

body.title: Hourly Time Conversation
body.subtitle: This will take an hourly wage and convert it into an object that you can query with a dollar amount to get cost in hours

body.value: > `monotime` works with the following range of salary intervals; `hourly, bi-weekly, monthly, monthly, yearly`

body.title: Example Time Conversation
